recipe.title: Parsley-Almond Pesto
ingredients: 1 tablespoon fresh thyme leaves or 1 teaspoon dried
1/4 cup almond oil or olive oil
1/4 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese (about 1 scant ounce)
instructions: Finely chop parsley, toasted almonds, thyme and garlic in food processor. Gradually mix in oil and process until pureed. Mix in Parmesan cheese and chicken broth. Season pesto to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 3 days ahead. Store in airtight container in refrigerate.)
